thread.title: A steep drop in the Dow rocks Wall Street

title: A steep drop in the Dow rocks Wall Street
text:
A steep drop in the Dow rocks Wall Street Friday, February 02, 2018 - 01:57 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average suffered one of its worst one-day point slumps in history, capping the biggest weekly drop since 2016, after a surge in borrowing costs sparked a mass exodus from stocks.   
The Dow Jones Industrial Average suffered one of its worst one-day point slumps in history, capping the biggest weekly drop since 2016, after a surge in borrowing costs sparked a mass exodus from stocks.  //reut.rs/2DWZUpD
